summary: Comprehensive testing of IR Portal, PACS Integration, and Voice Dictation Analytics. All 24 backend API tests passed. Frontend UI verification confirmed all features working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: Super Admin user (ygtnetworks@gmail.com) has organization_id=None which prevents login via the region-based login flow. Consider adding a separate super admin login endpoint or allowing super_admin to login without organization_id check.
seed_data_creation: Test IR procedures created with TEST_ prefix during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All new features tested and working: 1) IR Portal with Dashboard, Status Board, Schedule, All Procedures tabs - all functional with procedure creation, status updates, pre-assessment, sedation monitoring, 2) PACS Integration in demo mode - config, status, study search, viewer URL, worklist, HL7 workflows all working, 3) Voice Dictation Analytics - Overview with charts, Top Users, Audit Logs tabs all working. Navigation links in sidebar working for both IR (radiologist role) and Voice Analytics (admin roles).

interventional_radiology_portal.dashboard_tab: PASS - Shows stats (Today's Cases, In Progress, In Recovery, Completed, Scheduled), Procedures In Progress, Patients In Recovery, Today's Schedule
interventional_radiology_portal.status_board_tab: PASS - Shows IR Suite Status Board with Procedure Rooms (4 rooms), Recovery Area, Upcoming Today
interventional_radiology_portal.all_procedures_tab: PASS - Shows all procedures with filters
interventional_radiology_portal.procedure_actions: PASS - View, Start, Pre-Assessment buttons working

pacs_integration.GET /api/pacs/status: PASS - Returns connectivity status (disconnected in demo mode)
pacs_integration.POST /api/pacs/studies/search: PASS - Returns demo studies in demo mode
pacs_integration.GET /api/pacs/viewer/url: PASS - Generates viewer URL with demo info

voice_dictation_analytics.overview_tab: PASS - Shows Daily Usage Trend, Usage by Context, Usage by Role charts
voice_dictation_analytics.top_users_tab: PASS - Shows top users by transcription count
voice_dictation_analytics.audit_logs_tab: PASS - Shows detailed audit logs with pagination

mocked_apis_list: PACS/DICOM integration runs in demo mode (PACS_HOST=localhost) - returns mock study data
DICOM viewer URL generation works but points to demo URLs when DICOM_VIEWER_URL not configured

notes: All features working as expected. PACS integration is in demo mode since no dcm4chee server is configured. Voice Analytics requires admin role (hospital_admin, super_admin, hospital_it_admin) for access.
